content.title: Just 2 weeks to go! SterilPure is all set to ramp up for mass production!
content.creator:
SterilPure
March 11, 2025
content.content:
Hey there,
Just 2 weeks left to snag our best offer on Kickstarter! Thanks to your incredible support, we've surpassed an astonishing 3,295% of our funding goal!
If you’ve been following us on social media, you might already know that SterilPure has officially entered mass production. This critical phase involves our factory utilizing advanced molds to manufacture SterilPure components on a large scale, ensuring exceptional quality for every single product.Previously, we used 3D printing to create prototype covers, which, as some of you may have noticed in our content creator's videos, sometimes had visible scratches. With mass production, those imperfections are a thing of the past. The advanced molds deliver a flawless finish, ensuring that every SterilPure product meets the highest standards.
We’re thrilled to share a sneak peek of our production mold.
And here are some questions from our recently pledged customers. Take a look to learn more about the product you're about to receive!
Should you have any questions or encounter any issues, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us directly at hello@sterilpure.com  or via Kickstarter messages. We’re here to assist you and ensure you get the best experience while supporting our project.   
Only 2 weeks left! Share SterilPure with your friends and family before our best offer ends!
Warm regards,  
The SterilPure Team

comments.text: Do the ultrasonic vibrations have any negative effect on cast iron cookware? Will it damage seasoning?

Hello Sir, ultrasonic cleaning with SterilPure's power and settings will not damage cast iron cookware or its seasoning. Cast iron is incredibly durable, and the polymerized oil on its surface adheres strongly when properly maintained. SterilPure's ultrasonic cleaning is far gentler than abrasive scrubbing or harsh chemicals, ensuring your cookware remains in good condition.

content.title: 392% funded in 24 hours! We did it! 🎉
content.creator:
SterilPure
February 14, 2025
content.content:
Hey there,
We are thrilled to share an incredible news—thanks to your amazing support, we’ve achieved 392% of our funding goal in just 24 hours! 🎉🎉🎉
This overwhelming response has exceeded all our expectations and is a testament to the passion and belief you have in our project. 
Your support has not only enabled us to achieve our goal but has also paved the way for us to broaden our vision of creating a simple, convenient, and enjoyable cleaning experience with advanced technology🧼🧼🧼 while delivering even greater value. Thank you for being a vital part of this journey!
Latest Updates:

✨ New Review Alert!
We’ve received another glowing review from Alderand Jade, who had the chance to test our product. Don’t miss their thoughts—check it out here! 👇
✨ New Section “Explore our factory” Added!

We understand that some users may have concerns about delivery reliability, especially due to past instances where other ultrasonic products on Kickstarter fell short of expectations. While such cases have understandably affected trust within the community, we want to reassure our backers about SterilPure. 
That’s why we’ve added a new section to our campaign page called “Explore Our Factory.” If you haven’t checked it out yet, we encourage you to take a look!
Explore our factory showroom, featuring a wide range of commercial-grade cleaning machines crafted on-site. The video concludes with an exclusive highlight of the SterilPure home dishwasher.
SterilPure's factory has extensive expertise in manufacturing commercial ultrasonic cleaners, with commercial ultrasonic cleaners products consistently in production and sales. This enables the factory to easily scale up capacity to meet SterilPure's demands, alleviating consumer concerns about delivery capabilities.
This video showcases SterilPure's production factory, highlighting its rich history and advanced technological expertise. SterilPure is manufactured in a world-class facility with extensive experience in producing commercial-grade ultrasonic cleaners. This ensures that when developing a household ultrasonic dishwasher, the factory can guarantee both quality and safety without compromise.
Thank you once again for your incredible support!  
Although we’ve reached this incredible milestone, our journey is just beginning. If our vision of transforming cleaning into a simple, convenient, and enjoyable experience resonates with you🧼🧼🧼, we’d be thrilled if you shared SterilPure with your friends, family, and loved ones.
Should you have any questions or encounter any issues, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us directly at hello@sterilpure.com  or via Kickstarter messages. We’re here to assist you and ensure you get the best experience while supporting our project.  
Let’s keep the momentum going strong!  
Warm regards,  
The SterilPure Team
